name: SwapVar
description:
A 2D platformer where numbers are your friend!

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys

Jump - Z

Open Editor - Space Bar

Restart Level - R

Upon opening the editor, you can use the mouse to click on objects to reveal their variables.  Once you have done so, you may swap any variables by dragging them over each other.  This also works between different objects.  Have fun experimenting!
